abstract: Presidential candidate Chris Christie's intense courtship of New Hampshire's political elite, onslaught aimed at reviving New Jersey governor's flagging campaign, results in several prominent expressions of support, including unexpected prize of early and forceful endorsement from influential New Hampshire Union Leader newspaper.
lead_paragraph: A long and relentless pursuit of support from leaders in the first Republican primary state is paying off for Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey.

headline.main: Chasing Endorsements, Chris Christie Showers New Hampshire With Calls and Texts
headline.print_headline: Chasing Endorsements, Christie Showers New Hampshire With Calls and Texts

snippet: A long and relentless pursuit of support from leaders in the first Republican primary state is paying off for Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey.
